Text: "Mad Men" is an American period drama television series created by Matthew Weiner and broadcast on the cable network AMC.

Text: List of Mad Men episodes:  The show is set primarily in the 1960s and is centered on the private and professional life of Don Draper (Jon Hamm), an enigmatic advertising executive on Madison Avenue.
